name: LOL Surprise! Room Makeover
description:
LOL Surprise! Room Makeover is an exciting Match 3 game where you get to customize each of The Crew’s Club Rooms however you want!

Play matches to earn L.O.L. Surprise! Balls, where you will unlock tons of new Dolls, Furniture, Stickers and Decorations to make each Club Room reflect your personal sense of style.

Unlock hundreds of L.O.L. Surprise! Balls and celebrate the world’s favorite toys with this vibrant and playful game.

Features:
-Immersive Match-3 challenges will keep you coming back for just one more turn!
-See the dolls of L.O.L. Surprise! come to life in 3D
-Decorate each room just how you like with furniture, stickers, and dolls
-Open hundreds of L.O.L. Surprise! Balls
